intro.title: Dixit Based Online</br>Card Game
intro.description: Love to play Dixit? We have created an online version of the legendary game by adding modern features to it. Start playing Fabletopia online right now!

supportUs.title: Do you like Fabletopia?</br> Support the project!
supportUs.makeDonateDesc: Your donation will go towards supporting the development and improvement of the game and its online community. Thank you for your support!
supportUs.orderCardDesc: Want to create a custom card? We will make it and add it to the game. Make a donation in the amount of 5 USD. In the description for the transfer, specify your nickname, email address and a description of the card.

startGame.invited: Your have been invited to the game
startGame.signUpDescription: Wanna save your game progress or to get extra cards?

waitingRoom.waitText: Wait for at least 3 players to start the game

game.descriptionMustFilling: Your Narrator, Description must be filled.
